mapper.select: /* getAssetInfo */ SELECT AI.AST_INFO_SN, CONCAT(ACP.AST_CP_CODE_NM, ' > ', ACC.AST_TYPE_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC1.AST_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC2.AST_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC3.AST_CODE_NM) AS AST_GUBUN, AI.AST_NO, AI.BARCODE_TYPE, AI.AST_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(AI.PURC_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') AS PURC_DATE, AI.PURC_PRICE, AI.MODEL_SIZE, AI.MODEL_NAME, AI.PURC_COMPANY_ID, IFNULL((SELECT CRM_NM FROM CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO WHERE AI.PURC_COMPANY_ID = CRM_SN), '-') AS PURC_COMPANY_NAME, AI.MF_COMPANY, CONCAT(AI.QTY, ' ', AI.UNIT) AS QTY, AI.ORG_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = '0' THEN CONCAT('[법인운영]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'R' THEN CONCAT('[R&D]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'S' THEN CONCAT('[비R&D]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'D' THEN CONCAT('[엔지니어링]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'V' THEN CONCAT('[용역/기타]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = '3' THEN CONCAT('[기타]', AI.PJT_NM) END FUNDING_SOURCE_TXT, AP.AST_PLACE_NAME, AI.DEPT_SEQ, AI.EMP_SEQ, AI.EMP_NAME, AI.PURPOSE, AI.REMARK, IC.INSIDE_DT_CODE_NM, AI.AST_FILE_NO, AI.RELATED_FILE_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_OTHER_HISTORY WHERE AST_INFO_SN = AI.AST_INFO_SN AND TYPE = 'M') AS MCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_OTHER_HISTORY WHERE AST_INFO_SN = AI.AST_INFO_SN AND TYPE = 'O') AS OCOUNT FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO AI LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_POSITION ACP ON AI.AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID = ACP.AST_CP_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_CLASS ACC ON AI.AST_TYPE_CODE = ACC.AST_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC1 ON AI.AST_CODE_ID_1 = AC1.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC2 ON AC2.AST_UPPER_CODE = AC1.AST_CODE_ID AND AI.AST_CODE_ID_2 = AC2.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC3 ON AC3.AST_UPPER_CODE = AC2.AST_CODE_ID AND AI.AST_CODE_ID_3 = AC3.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE AP ON AI.AST_PLACE_SN = AP.AST_PLACE_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INSIDE_CODE IC ON AI.AST_STS_CODE = IC.INSIDE_DT_CODE AND IC.INSIDE_MD_CODE = '03' WHERE AI.AST_INFO_SN = #{astInfoSn}

/* getAstInfoModHistory */ SELECT AST_INFO_MOD_SN, REPLACE(REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s'), 'PM', '오후'), 'AM', '오전') AS REG_DATE, REG_EMP_NAME, REG_EMP_IP FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_MOD_HISTORY WHERE AST_INFO_SN = #{astInfoSn} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

/* getAstInfoModHistoryItem */ SELECT A.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_MOD_HISTORY_ITEM A JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_MOD_HISTORY B ON A.AST_INFO_MOD_SN = B.AST_INFO_MOD_SN WHERE B.AST_INFO_SN = #{astInfoSn}

/* getInsideCodeList */ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INSIDE_CODE WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y'
AND INSIDE_MD_CODE = #{insideMdCode}

/* getInsideCode */ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INSIDE_CODE WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y' AND INSIDE_MD_CODE = #{insideMdCode}
AND INSIDE_DT_CODE = #{insideDtCode}
mapper.insert:
/* setAssetInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO ( AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID, AST_TYPE_CODE, AST_CODE_ID_1, AST_CODE_ID_2, AST_CODE_ID_3, AST_STS_CODE, AST_PLACE_SN, AST_NO, AST_NAME, PURC_DATE, PURC_PRICE, PURC_COMPANY_ID, MODEL_SIZE, MODEL_NAME, MF_COMPANY, ORG_COUNTRY, QTY, UNIT, REG_TYPE, FUNDING_SOURCE, EXP_ACCOUNT, DEPT_SEQ, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, PURPOSE, REMARK, REG_EMP_SEQ, PJT_NM ) VALUES ( #{astCodeCompanyId}, #{astTypeCode}, #{astCodeId1}, #{astCodeId2}, #{astCodeId3}, #{astStsCode}, #{astPlaceSn}, #{astNo}, #{astName}, #{purcDate}, #{purcPrice}, #{purcCompanyId}, #{modelSize}, #{modelName}, #{mfCompany}, #{orgCountry}, #{qty}, #{unit}, #{regType}, #{fundingSource}, #{expAccount}, #{deptSeq}, #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{purpose}, #{remark}, #{regEmpSeq}, #{pjtNm} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_ASSET_INFO'
mapper.update: /* setAssetInfoUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO SET AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID = #{astCodeCompanyId}, AST_TYPE_CODE = #{astTypeCode}, AST_CODE_ID_1 = #{astCodeId1}, AST_CODE_ID_2 = #{astCodeId2}, AST_CODE_ID_3 = #{astCodeId3}, AST_STS_CODE = #{astStsCode}, AST_PLACE_SN = #{astPlaceSn}, AST_NO = #{astNo}, AST_NAME = #{astName}, PURC_DATE = #{purcDate}, PURC_PRICE = #{purcPrice}, PURC_COMPANY_ID = #{purcCompanyId}, MODEL_SIZE = #{modelSize}, MODEL_NAME = #{modelName}, MF_COMPANY = #{mfCompany}, ORG_COUNTRY = #{orgCountry}, QTY = #{qty}, UNIT = #{unit}, REG_TYPE = #{regType}, BARCODE_TYPE = #{barcodeType}, FUNDING_SOURCE = #{fundingSource}, EXP_ACCOUNT = #{expAccount}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, PURPOSE = #{purpose}, REMARK = #{remark}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_INFO_SN = #{astInfoSn}
/* setAssetDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO SET ACTIVE = 'N', MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_INFO_SN IN(${astInfoSn})
mapper.select: /* getAstManage */ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_MANAGE ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 1

/* getAssetInfoAll */ SELECT AI.*, CASE WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 0 THEN CONCAT('[법인운영]', AI.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 1 THEN CONCAT('[연구개발]', AI.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 2 THEN CONCAT('[교육사업]', AI.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 4 THEN CONCAT('[개발사업]', AI.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 5 THEN CONCAT('[기능보강]', AI.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 6 THEN CONCAT('[지원사업]', AI.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 7 THEN CONCAT('[협의회]', AI.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 3 THEN CONCAT('[기타사업]', AI.EXP_ACCOUNT) END FUNDING_SOURCE_TXT FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO AI WHERE AST_INFO_SN = #{astInfoSn}
/* getAstOtherHistoryList */ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_OTHER_HISTORY OH WHERE AST_INFO_SN = #{astInfoSn}
mapper.insert: /* setAstOtherHistory */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_OTHER_HISTORY ( AST_INFO_SN, TYPE, OTHER_TITLE, EXE_DATE, UNIT_PRICE, STANDARD, ETC, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{astInfoSn}, #{type}, #{otherTitle}, #{exeDate}, #{unitPrice}, #{standard}, #{etc}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.update: /* setAstOtherHistory */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_OTHER_HISTORY SET OTHER_TITLE = #{otherTitle}, EXE_DATE = #{exeDate}, UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice}, STANDARD = #{standard}, ETC = #{etc}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_INFO_OTHER_SN = #{astInfoOtherSn}
mapper.insert: /* setAstManage */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_MANAGE ( MANAGE_MAIN_EMP_SEQ, MANAGE_MAIN_EMP_NAME, MANAGE_SUB_EMP_SEQ, MANAGE_SUB_EMP_NAME, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{manageMainEmpSeq}, #{manageMainEmpName}, #{manageSubEmpSeq}, #{manageSubEmpName}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.update: /* setAstManageUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_MANAGE SET MANAGE_MAIN_EMP_SEQ = #{manageMainEmpSeq}, MANAGE_MAIN_EMP_NAME = #{manageMainEmpName}, MANAGE_SUB_EMP_SEQ = #{manageSubEmpSeq}, MANAGE_SUB_EMP_NAME = #{manageSubEmpName}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_MANAGE_SN = #{astManageSn}

/* setAstInfoBatch */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO SET
AST_NAME = #{astName},
DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, EMP_NAME = #{empName},
PURC_PRICE = #{purcPrice},
AST_STS_CODE = #{astStsCode},
MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_INFO_SN IN(${astInfoSn})
mapper.insert:
/* setAstInfoModHistory */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_MOD_HISTORY ( AST_INFO_SN, REG_EMP_IP, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_EMP_NAME ) VALUE ( #{astInfoSn}, #{regEmpIp}, #{regEmpSeq}, #{regEmpName} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_ASSET_INFO_MOD_HISTORY'
mapper.delete: /* setAstInfoModHistoryDel */ DELETE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_MOD_HISTORY WHERE AST_INFO_MOD_SN = #{astInfoModSn}
mapper.insert:
/* setAstInfoModHistoryItem */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO_MOD_HISTORY_ITEM ( AST_INFO_MOD_SN, MOD_ITEM_NAME, MOD_OLD_ITEM_INFO, MOD_NEW_ITEM_INFO, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES
( #{item.astInfoModSn}, #{item.modItemName}, #{item.modOldItemInfo}, #{item.modNewItemInfo}, #{item.regEmpSeq} )
mapper.update: /* setAssetCodePositionUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_POSITION SET AST_CP_CODE = #{astCpCode}, AST_CP_CODE_NM = #{astCpCodeNm}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID = #{astCodeCompanyId}
/* setAssetCodePositionDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_POSITION SET ACTIVE ='N' WHERE AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID IN (${astCodeCompanyId})

/* setClassDivisionUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_CLASS SET AST_TYPE_CODE = #{astTypeCode}, AST_TYPE_CODE_NM = #{astTypeCodeNm}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_CODE_TYPE_ID = #{astCodeTypeId}
/* setClassDivisionDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_CLASS SET ACTIVE ='N' WHERE AST_CODE_TYPE_ID IN (${astCodeTypeId})
mapper.select:
/* getAssetPlaceList */
SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY ( CASE WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(AST_PLACE_NAME, 1)) BETWEEN 48 AND 57 THEN 1 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(AST_PLACE_NAME, 1)) < 128 THEN 3 ELSE 2 END), AST_PLACE_NAME
mapper.update: /* setAssetPlaceUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE SET AST_PLACE_NAME = #{astPlaceName}, AST_MANAGE_DEPT = #{astManageDept}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_PLACE_SN = #{astPlaceSn}
/* setAssetPlaceDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE SET ACTIVE ='N' WHERE AST_PLACE_SN IN (${astPlaceSn})
mapper.insert: /* setCategoryCode */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE ( AST_UPPER_CODE, AST_CODE, AST_CODE_NM, AST_DEPRE_TYPE, AST_DEPRE_PERCENT, AST_USE_YEAR, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{astUpperCode}, #{astCode}, #{astCodeNm}, #{astDepreType}, #{astDeprePercent}, #{astUseYear}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.select: /* getMaxCategoryCode */ SELECT RIGHT(CONCAT('00', IFNULL(max(AST_CODE), 0) + 1), 2) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE A WHERE AST_UPPER_CODE = #{astUpperCode}
mapper.update: /* setCategoryCodeDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE SET ACTIVE ='N' WHERE AST_CODE_ID IN (${astCodeId})

/* setAstPdaInfoBatch */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PDA_OPT SET PLACE_MOD_TYPE = '1', NEW_AST_PLACE_SN = #{newAssetPlaceSn}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE AST_PDA_INFO_SN IN(${astPdaInfoSn})
mapper.insert: /* setAstPdaInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PDA_INFO ( AST_INFO_SN, AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID, AST_TYPE_CODE, AST_CODE_ID_1, AST_CODE_ID_2, AST_CODE_ID_3, AST_STS_CODE, ORIGIN_AST_PLACE_SN, AST_NO, AST_NAME, PURC_DATE, PURC_PRICE, PURC_COMPANY_ID, MODEL_SIZE, MODEL_NAME, MF_COMPANY, ORG_COUNTRY, QTY, UNIT, REG_TYPE, BARCODE_TYPE, FUNDING_SOURCE, EXP_ACCOUNT, DEPT_SEQ, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, PURPOSE, REMARK, REG_STATUS, AST_FILE_NO, RELATED_FILE_NO, REG_EMP_SEQ ) SELECT AST_INFO_SN, AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID, AST_TYPE_CODE, AST_CODE_ID_1, AST_CODE_ID_2, AST_CODE_ID_3, AST_STS_CODE, AST_PLACE_SN, AST_NO, AST_NAME, PURC_DATE, PURC_PRICE, PURC_COMPANY_ID, MODEL_SIZE, MODEL_NAME, MF_COMPANY, ORG_COUNTRY, QTY, UNIT, REG_TYPE, BARCODE_TYPE, FUNDING_SOURCE, EXP_ACCOUNT, DEPT_SEQ, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, PURPOSE, REMARK, REG_STATUS, AST_FILE_NO, RELATED_FILE_NO, #{empSeq} FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y'
/* setAstPdaOpt */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PDA_OPT ( AST_PDA_INFO_SN, REG_EMP_SEQ ) SELECT AST_PDA_INFO_SN, #{empSeq} FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PDA_INFO WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y'
mapper.select:
/* getAstPdaInfo */ SELECT API.AST_PDA_INFO_SN, API.AST_INFO_SN, AI.AST_STS_CODE AS ORIGIN_AST_STS_CODE, CONCAT(ACP.AST_CP_CODE_NM, ' > ', ACC.AST_TYPE_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC1.AST_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC2.AST_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC3.AST_CODE_NM) AS AST_GUBUN, API.AST_NO, API.BARCODE_TYPE, API.AST_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(API.PURC_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') AS PURC_DATE, API.PURC_PRICE, API.MODEL_SIZE, API.MODEL_NAME, API.PURC_COMPANY_ID, '-' AS PURC_COMPANY_NAME, API.MF_COMPANY, CONCAT(API.QTY, ' ', API.UNIT) AS QTY, API.ORG_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN API.FUNDING_SOURCE = 0 THEN CONCAT('[법인운영]', API.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN API.FUNDING_SOURCE = 1 THEN CONCAT('[연구개발]', API.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN API.FUNDING_SOURCE = 2 THEN CONCAT('[교육사업]', API.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN API.FUNDING_SOURCE = 4 THEN CONCAT('[개발사업]', API.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN API.FUNDING_SOURCE = 5 THEN CONCAT('[기능보강]', API.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN API.FUNDING_SOURCE = 6 THEN CONCAT('[지원사업]', API.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN API.FUNDING_SOURCE = 7 THEN CONCAT('[협의회]', API.EXP_ACCOUNT) WHEN API.FUNDING_SOURCE = 3 THEN CONCAT('[기타사업]', API.EXP_ACCOUNT) END FUNDING_SOURCE_TXT, AP.AST_PLACE_NAME, API.DEPT_SEQ, API.EMP_SEQ, API.EMP_NAME, API.PURPOSE, API.REMARK, IC.INSIDE_DT_CODE_NM, API.AST_FILE_NO, API.RELATED_FILE_NO,
APO.INSPECTION_TYPE, APO.NEW_AST_PLACE_SN, APO.NEW_AST_STS_CODE, APO.AST_STS_MOD_REASON FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PDA_INFO API JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PDA_OPT APO ON API.AST_PDA_INFO_SN = APO.AST_PDA_INFO_SN JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO AI ON API.AST_INFO_SN = AI.AST_INFO_SN JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_POSITION ACP ON API.AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID = ACP.AST_CP_CODE JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_CLASS ACC ON API.AST_TYPE_CODE = ACC.AST_TYPE_CODE JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC1 ON API.AST_CODE_ID_1 = AC1.AST_CODE JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC2 ON AC2.AST_UPPER_CODE = AC1.AST_CODE_ID AND API.AST_CODE_ID_2 = AC2.AST_CODE JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC3 ON AC3.AST_UPPER_CODE = AC2.AST_CODE_ID AND API.AST_CODE_ID_3 = AC3.AST_CODE JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE AP ON API.ORIGIN_AST_PLACE_SN = AP.AST_PLACE_SN JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INSIDE_CODE IC ON API.AST_STS_CODE = IC.INSIDE_DT_CODE AND IC.INSIDE_MD_CODE = '03' WHERE API.AST_PDA_INFO_SN = #{astPdaInfoSn}
mapper.update: /*updInspectionType*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PDA_OPT SET INSPECTION_TYPE = #{inspectionType} WHERE AST_PDA_INFO_SN IN (${astPdaInfoSn})
mapper.select: /* getInventionInfo */ SELECT III.*, IFNULL((SELECT SHEI.EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO SHEI WHERE SHEI.DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT SSHDI.DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO SSHDI WHERE (SSHDI.DEPT_SEQ = HEI.DEPT_SEQ OR SSHDI.PARENT_DEPT_SEQ = HEI.DEPT_SEQ) AND DEPT_LEVEL = 1) AND DUTY_CODE IN (1, 2, 3) AND ACTIVE = 'Y'), "공석") AS MANAGER_NAME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO III LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HEI ON III.REG_EMP_SEQ = HEI.EMP_SEQ WHERE INVENTION_INFO_SN = #{inventionInfoSn}

/* getInventionShareList */ SELECT IISI.*, HEI.DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_SHARE_INFO IISI LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HEI ON IISI.EMP_SEQ = HEI.EMP_SEQ WHERE IISI.INVENTION_INFO_SN = #{inventionInfoSn} AND IISI.ACTIVE = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
/* setInventionInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO ( SHARE_SN, SHARE_NAME, IPR_CLASS, IPR_NAME, TITLE, DETAIL_CN, REG_DATE, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_EMP_NAME ) VALUE ( #{shareSn}, #{shareName}, #{iprClass}, #{iprName}, #{title}, #{detailCn}, #{regDate}, #{regEmpSeq}, #{regEmpName} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_INVENTION_INFO'
mapper.update: /*setInventionUpdate*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO SET SHARE_SN = #{shareSn}, SHARE_NAME = #{shareName}, IPR_CLASS = #{iprClass}, IPR_NAME = #{iprName}, TITLE = #{title}, DETAIL_CN = #{detailCn}, REG_DATE = #{regDate} WHERE INVENTION_INFO_SN = #{inventionInfoSn}
mapper.insert:
/* setRprResultInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO ( RPR_CLASS, RPR_NAME, SHARE_SN, SHARE_NAME, IPR_CLASS, IPR_NAME, TITLE, DETAIL_CN, REG_DATE, REG_NUM, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_EMP_NAME, BEFORE_SN ) VALUE ( #{rprClass}, #{rprName}, #{shareSn}, #{shareName}, #{iprClass}, #{iprName}, #{title}, #{detailCn}, #{regDate}, #{regNum}, #{regEmpSeq}, #{regEmpName}, #{befSn} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_INVENTION_INFO'

/* setRprReceiptInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO ( RPR_CLASS, RPR_NAME, SHARE_SN, SHARE_NAME, IPR_CLASS, IPR_NAME, STATE_SN, STATE_NAME, TAIN_SN, TAIN_NAME, TECH_SN, TECH_NAME, CONFIDENTIALITY_SN, CONFIDENTIALITY_NAME, TITLE, SINGLE_SN, SINGLE_NAME, APPLICANT_NAME, DETAIL_CN, APPLICANT_NUM, APPLICANT_DT, APPLICANT_NATION, REG_NUM, REG_DATE, EXPIRATION_DT, REMARK_CN, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_EMP_NAME, BEFORE_SN, RELATED_FILE_NO, RELATED_AFILE_NO, QUO_FILE_NO ) VALUE ( #{rprClass}, #{rprName}, #{shareSn}, #{shareName}, #{iprClass}, #{iprName}, #{stateSn}, #{stateName}, #{tainSn}, #{tainName}, #{techSn}, #{techName}, #{confidentialitySn}, #{confidentialityName}, #{title}, #{singleSn}, #{singleName}, #{applicantName}, #{detailCn}, #{applicantNum}, #{applicantDt}, #{applicantNation}, #{regNum}, #{regDate}, #{expirationDt}, #{remarkCn}, #{regEmpSeq}, #{regEmpName}, #{befSn}, #{relatedFileNo}, #{relatedAfileNo}, #{quoFileNo} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_INVENTION_INFO'

/* setInventionShareInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_SHARE_INFO ( INVENTION_INFO_SN, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, SHARE ) VALUES
( #{inventionInfoSn}, #{item.shareEmpSeq}, #{item.shareEmpName}, #{item.share} )
mapper.update: /* updateBefApprStat */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO SET STATUS = #{approveStatCode}, APPROVAL_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DOC_ID = #{docId} WHERE INVENTION_INFO_SN = (SELECT BEFORE_SN FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO WHERE INVENTION_INFO_SN = #{inventionInfoSn})
mapper.select: /*getEqipmnList*/ SELECT CM_CODE_NM AS TEXT, CM_CODE_ID AS VALUE FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 1

/*getEqipmnNameList*/ SELECT eqipmn_name AS TEXT, eqipmn_mst_sn AS VALUE, regtr_sn AS EMP_SEQ, HOURLY_USAGE_FEE AS HOURLY_USAGE_FEE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST WHERE eqipmn_gbn_cmmn_cd_sn = #{eqipmnGbnCmmnCdSn}
/*getPrtpcoGbnNameList*/ SELECT CM_CODE_NM AS TEXT, CM_CODE_ID AS VALUE FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 2
SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST WHERE REGTR_NAME = #{userName} ORDER BY UPDT_DT DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM cam_inside.dj_asset_code WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y'
SELECT distinct a.AST_GROUP_CODE_ID, a.AST_MC_CODE, a.AST_MC_CODE_NM FROM cam_inside.dj_asset_code AS a
SELECT distinct a.AST_MD_CODE, a.AST_MD_CODE_NM FROM cam_inside.dj_asset_code AS a WHERE a.ACTIVE = 'Y' and a.AST_MC_CODE = #{AST_MC_CODE}

SELECT a.AST_DT_CODE, a.AST_DT_CODE_NM, CONCAT(a.AST_MC_CODE,a.AST_MD_CODE,a.AST_DT_CODE) AS 'AST_CODE' FROM cam_inside.dj_asset_code AS a WHERE a.ACTIVE = 'Y' and a.AST_MC_CODE = #{AST_MC_CODE} and a.AST_MD_CODE = #{AST_MD_CODE}

/*getEqipmnUseListByPjt*/ SELECT A.eqipmn_use_sn as EQIPMN_USE_SN, A.sort_sn as SORT_SN, B.eqipmn_gbn_name as EQIPMN_GBN_NAME, B.eqipmn_gbn_cmmn_cd_sn as EQIPMN_GBN_CMMN_CD_SN, B.eqipmn_name as EQIPMN_NAME, A.use_pd_str_de as USE_PD_STR_DE, A.user_name as USER_NAME, C.dept_name as DEPT_NAME, A.oper_cn as OPER_CN, A.use_time as USE_TIME, A.use_amt as USE_AMT, A.client_prtpco_name as CLIENT_PRTPCO_NAME, A.prtpco_gbn_name as PRTPCO_GBN_NAME, A.prtpco_gbn_sn as PRTPCO_GBN_SN, A.actvt_yn AS ACTVT_YN, A.end_stat AS END_STAT FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST B ON A.eqipmn_mst_sn = B.eqipmn_mst_sn JOIN (select EMP_NAME_KR, DEPT_NAME from cam_hr.DJ_EMP_INFO order by EMP_NAME_KR desc) C ON A.user_name = c.EMP_NAME_KR WHERE 1=1 AND pjt_sn = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY EQIPMN_USE_SN DESC
mapper.update: /* setEquipmenUseUpdate */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SET eqipmn_mst_sn = #{eqipmnMstSn}, use_pd_str_de = #{usePdStrDe}, user_name = #{userName}, user_sn = #{userSn}, oper_cn = #{operCn}, use_time = #{useTime}, use_amt = #{useAmt}, prtpco_gbn_name = #{prtpcoGbnName}, prtpco_gbn_sn = #{prtpcoGbnSn}, reg_de = #{regDe}, updt_dt = NOW(), updusr_sn = #{updusrSn}, str_time = #{time1}, end_time = #{time2}, per_amt = #{perAmt}, per_reason = #{perReason}, pjt_sn = #{pjtSn}, cust_nm = #{custNm}, client_prtpco_name = #{clientPrtpcoName} WHERE eqipmn_use_sn = #{pk}
mapper.select: /*getEqipmnUseUpdateList*/ SELECT A.eqipmn_use_sn as EQIPMN_USE_SN, A.sort_sn as SORT_SN, B.eqipmn_mst_sn as EQIPMN_MST_SN, B.eqipmn_gbn_name as EQIPMN_GBN_NAME, B.eqipmn_gbn_cmmn_cd_sn as EQIPMN_GBN_CMMN_CD_SN, B.eqipmn_name as EQIPMN_NAME, A.user_sn as USER_SN, DATE_FORMAT(A.use_pd_str_de, '%Y-%m-%d') as USE_PD_STR_DE, /*DATE_FORMAT(A.use_pd_end_de, '%Y-%m-%d') as USE_PD_END_DE,*/ A.user_name as USER_NAME, A.oper_cn as OPER_CN, A.use_time as USE_TIME, A.use_amt as USE_AMT, A.cust_nm as CUST_NM, A.client_prtpco_name as CLIENT_PRTPCO_NAME, A.prtpco_gbn_sn as PRTPCO_GBN_SN, A.prtpco_gbn_name as PRTPCO_GBN_NAME, A.str_time as STR_TIME, A.end_time as END_TIME, A.per_amt as PER_AMT, A.per_reason as PER_REASON, A.pjt_sn as PJT_SN, C.PJT_NM, A.actvt_yn as ACTVT_YN, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_de, '%Y-%m-%d') as REG_DE FROM cam_inside.dj_eqipmn_use A LEFT JOIN cam_inside.dj_eqipmn_mst B ON A.eqipmn_mst_sn = B.eqipmn_mst_sn LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT C ON C.PJT_SN = A.PJT_SN WHERE A.eqipmn_use_sn = #{pk}

/* getMDCategoryMonthly */ SELECT EQIPMN_GBN_NAME, EQIPMN_NAME, COUNT(EQIPMN_USE_SN) AS COUNT, SUM(USE_TIME) AS USE_TIME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST B ON A.eqipmn_mst_sn = B.eqipmn_mst_sn WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{searchDe}, '-01'), '%Y%m') AND A.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' AND B.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY EQIPMN_GBN_NAME, EQIPMN_NAME

/* getBookList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROW_NUM, IBI.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_INFO IBI, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE 1=1
AND (IBI.BK_LG_CD_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR IBI.BK_MD_CD_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR IBI.BK_CD_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND IBI.BK_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND IBI.BK_WRITER like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND IBI.BK_BUYER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND IBI.BK_REPL like CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
ORDER BY IBI.REG_DT ) RE LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.dj_file_info ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC) FI ON RE.BK_FILE_SN = FI.FILE_NO ORDER BY RE.ROW_NUM DESC
mapper.insert:
/* setBookInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_INFO ( BK_LG_CD, BK_LG_CD_NAME, BK_MD_CD, BK_MD_CD_NAME, BK_CD, BK_CD_NAME, BK_NAME, BK_WRITER, BK_PUBL, BK_BUY_COST, BK_BUY_CNT, BK_BUY_DT, BK_BUYER, BK_BUYER_NAME, BK_USER, BK_USER_NAME, BK_MNG_SEQ, BK_MNG_NAME, BK_MNG_SUB_SEQ, BK_MNG_SUB_NAME, BK_SMRY, BK_REPL, BK_DEPT_SEQ, BK_DEPT_NAME ) VALUES ( #{bkLgCd}, #{bkLgCdName}, #{bkMdCd}, #{bkMdCdName}, #{bkCd}, #{bkCdName}, #{bkName}, #{bkWriter}, #{bkPubl}, #{bkCost}, #{bkCnt}, #{bkBuyDt}, #{bkBuyer}, #{bkBuyerName}, #{bkUser}, #{bkUserName}, #{bkMngSeq}, #{bkMngName}, #{bkMngSubSeq}, #{bkMngSubName}, #{bkSmry}, #{bkRepl}, #{bkDeptSeq}, #{bkDeptName} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_BOOK_INFO'
mapper.select: /*getRprReceiptUpdateList*/
mapper.update: /* updRprReceipt */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO SET RPR_CLASS = #{rprClass}, RPR_NAME = #{rprName}, SHARE_SN = #{shareSn}, SHARE_NAME = #{shareName}, IPR_CLASS = #{iprClass}, IPR_NAME = #{iprName}, STATE_SN = #{stateSn}, STATE_NAME = #{stateName}, TAIN_SN = #{tainSn}, TAIN_NAME = #{tainName}, TECH_SN = #{techSn}, TECH_NAME = #{techName}, CONFIDENTIALITY_SN = #{confidentialitySn}, CONFIDENTIALITY_NAME = #{confidentialityName}, TITLE = #{title}, SINGLE_SN = #{singleSn}, SINGLE_NAME = #{singleName}, APPLICANT_NAME = #{applicantName}, DETAIL_CN = #{detailCn}, APPLICANT_NUM = #{applicantNum}, APPLICANT_DT = #{applicantDt}, APPLICANT_NATION = #{applicantNation}, REG_NUM = #{regNum}, REG_DATE = #{regDate}, EXPIRATION_DT = #{expirationDt}, REMARK_CN = #{remarkCn}, REG_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, REG_EMP_NAME = #{regEmpName} WHERE INVENTION_INFO_SN = #{inventionInfoSn}
/* updInventionShare */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_SHARE_INFO SET ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE INVENTION_INFO_SN = #{inventionInfoSn}

/* updRprAllChange */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INVENTION_INFO SET
STATE_SN = #{stateSn}, STATE_NAME = #{stateName},
TAIN_SN = #{tainSn}, TAIN_NAME = #{tainName},
TECH_SN = #{techSn}, TECH_NAME = #{techName},
CONFIDENTIALITY_SN = #{confidentialitySn}, CONFIDENTIALITY_NAME = #{confidentialityName},
UP_DT = NOW() WHERE RPR_CLASS = 2 AND ACTIVE = 'Y'
mapper.select: /* getMainCategoryMonthly */ SELECT C.*, CASE WHEN C.BEF_USE_TIME > C.USE_TIME THEN '감' ELSE '증' END AS STATUS, CASE WHEN C.BEF_USE_TIME > C.USE_TIME THEN C.BEF_USE_TIME - C.USE_TIME ELSE C.USE_TIME - C.BEF_USE_TIME END AS DIFF FROM ( SELECT B.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME, B.REGTR_NAME, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SA.USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SA LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST SB ON SA.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SB.EQIPMN_MST_SN WHERE DATE_FORMAT(SA.USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y-%m') = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CONCAT(#{searchDe}, '-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m')) AND (SA.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' AND SB.ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AND B.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME = SB.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME ) AS BEF_USE_TIME, SUM(A.USE_TIME) AS USE_TIME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST B ON A.EQIPMN_MST_SN = B.EQIPMN_MST_SN WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(A.USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y-%m') = #{searchDe} AND A.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' AND B.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY B.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME ORDER BY B.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME DESC ) C
/* getEquipApprovalInfo */ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPNM_APPROVAL WHERE APPLY_MONTH = #{searchDe} AND STATUS != 0
mapper.insert:
/* setEquipApprovalInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPNM_APPROVAL ( APPLY_MONTH, STATUS, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_EMP_NAME ) VALUES ( #{searchDe}, '0', #{regEmpSeq}, #{regEmpName} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_EQIPNM_APPROVAL'
mapper.select: /* getEquipStatType */ SELECT C.EQIPMN_NAME AS type FROM ( SELECT B.EQIPMN_NAME, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SA.USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SA LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST SB ON SA.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SB.EQIPMN_MST_SN WHERE DATE_FORMAT(SA.USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y-%m') = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CONCAT(#{applyMonth}, '-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m')) AND (SA.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' AND SB.ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AND B.EQIPMN_NAME = SB.EQIPMN_NAME ) AS BEF_USE_TIME, SUM(A.USE_TIME) AS USE_TIME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST B ON A.EQIPMN_MST_SN = B.EQIPMN_MST_SN WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(A.USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y-%m') = #{applyMonth} AND A.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY B.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME, B.EQIPMN_NAME ORDER BY B.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME DESC, B.EQIPMN_NAME ) C

/* getEquipStat */ SELECT TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((C.USE_TIME - C.BEF_USE_TIME) / C.BEF_USE_TIME) * 100, 0), 0) AS value FROM ( SELECT B.EQIPMN_NAME, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SA.USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SA LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST SB ON SA.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SB.EQIPMN_MST_SN WHERE DATE_FORMAT(SA.USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y-%m') = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CONCAT(#{applyMonth}, '-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m')) AND (SA.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' AND SB.ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AND B.EQIPMN_NAME = SB.EQIPMN_NAME ) AS BEF_USE_TIME, SUM(A.USE_TIME) AS USE_TIME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST B ON A.EQIPMN_MST_SN = B.EQIPMN_MST_SN WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(A.USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y-%m') = #{applyMonth} AND A.ACTVT_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY B.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME, B.EQIPMN_NAME ORDER BY B.EQIPMN_GBN_NAME DESC, B.EQIPMN_NAME ) C

/* getEquipStatRear */ SELECT R.EQIPMN_NAME AS EQIPMN_NAME, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.JAN - R.BEF) / R.BEF) * 100, 0), 0) AS JAN, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.FEB - R.JAN) / R.JAN) * 100, 0), 0) AS FEB, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.MAR - R.FEB) / R.FEB) * 100, 0), 0) AS MAR, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.APR - R.MAR) / R.MAR) * 100, 0), 0) AS APR, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.MAY - R.APR) / R.APR) * 100, 0), 0) AS MAY, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.JUN - R.MAY) / R.MAY) * 100, 0), 0) AS JUN, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.JUL - R.JUN) / R.JUN) * 100, 0), 0) AS JUL, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.AUG - R.JUL) / R.JUL) * 100, 0), 0) AS AUG, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.SEP - R.AUG) / R.AUG) * 100, 0), 0) AS SEP, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.OCT - R.SEP) / R.SEP) * 100, 0), 0) AS OCT, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.NOV - R.OCT) / R.OCT) * 100, 0), 0) AS NOV, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(((R.DECE - R.NOV) / R.NOV) * 100, 0), 0) AS DECE
FROM ( SELECT IEM.EQIPMN_NAME, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(${year}-1, '12') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS BEF, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '01') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS JAN, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '02') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS FEB, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '03') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS MAR, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '04') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS APR, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '05') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS MAY, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '06') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS JUN, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '07') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS JUL, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '08') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS AUG, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '09') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS SEP, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '10') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS OCT, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '11') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS NOV, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(USE_TIME), 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_USE SIEU WHERE IEM.EQIPMN_MST_SN = SIEU.EQIPMN_MST_SN AND DATE_FORMAT(USE_PD_STR_DE, '%Y%m') = CONCAT(#{year}, '12') AND ACTVT_YN = 'Y') AS DECE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EQIPMN_MST IEM WHERE IEM.ACTVT_YN = 'Y'
AND IEM.eqipmn_mst_sn in (${searchType})
ORDER BY IEM.EQIPMN_GBN_CMMN_CD_SN ) R
mapper.update: /* setBookUpdate */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_INFO SET BK_LG_CD = #{bkLgCd}, BK_LG_CD_NAME = #{bkLgCdName}, BK_MD_CD = #{bkMdCd}, BK_MD_CD_NAME = #{bkMdCdName}, BK_CD = #{bkCd}, BK_CD_NAME = #{bkCdName}, BK_NAME = #{bkName}, BK_WRITER = #{bkWriter}, BK_PUBL = #{bkPubl}, BK_BUY_COST = #{bkCost}, BK_BUY_CNT = #{bkCnt}, BK_BUY_DT = #{bkBuyDt}, BK_BUYER = #{bkBuyer}, BK_BUYER_NAME = #{bkBuyerName}, BK_USER = #{bkUser}, BK_USER_NAME = #{bkUserName}, BK_MNG_SEQ = #{bkMngSeq}, BK_MNG_NAME = #{bkMngName}, BK_MNG_SUB_SEQ = #{bkMngSubSeq}, BK_MNG_SUB_NAME = #{bkMngSubName}, BK_SMRY = #{bkSmry}, BK_REPL = #{bkRepl}, BK_DEPT_SEQ = #{bkDeptSeq}, BK_DEPT_NAME = #{bkDeptName} WHERE BK_SN = #{bkSn}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_INFO WHERE BK_SN = #{bkSn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_CODE ( BK_LG_CD, BK_MD_CD, BK_CD, BK_CD_NM ) VALUES ( #{bkLgCd}, #{bkMdCd}, #{bkCd}, #{bkCdNm} )
mapper.select: SELECT BK_MD_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_CODE WHERE BK_LG_CD = #{bkLgCd} ORDER BY BK_MD_CD DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT IFNULL(BK_CD, 0) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_CODE WHERE BK_LG_CD = #{bkLgCd} AND BK_MD_CD = #{bkMdCd} ORDER BY BK_CD DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_CODE WHERE BK_LG_CD = #{bkLgCd} AND BK_CD IS NULL AND BK_MD_CD IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_BOOK_CODE WHERE BK_LG_CD = #{bkLgCd} AND BK_MD_CD = #{bkMdCd} AND BK_CD IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM CAM_APPROVAL.DJ_DOC_INFO WHERE DOC_ID = #{DOC_ID}
SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE WHERE AST_UPPER_CODE = 0 AND ACTIVE = "Y"
SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE WHERE AST_UPPER_CODE = #{astUpperCode} AND ACTIVE = "Y"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_QR_INFO ( QR_NM, QR_CD, PROD_NM, PROD_BUY_DT, PJT_SN, MODEL_NM, REG_DT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{prodName}, #{qrCd}, #{prodName}, #{prodBuyDt}, #{project}, #{modelNm}, NOW(), #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_QR_INFO'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_QR_INFO WHERE QR_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%');
/* getContentFileList */ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}

SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A WHERE 1=1
AND A.BUSN_CLASS = #{busnClass}
AND A.PJT_STOP = "N"
AND A.PJT_STOP = "Y"
ORDER BY A.PJT_SN DESC

SELECT AI.AST_INFO_SN, CONCAT(ACP.AST_CP_CODE_NM, ' > ', ACC.AST_TYPE_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC1.AST_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC2.AST_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC3.AST_CODE_NM) AS AST_GUBUN, AI.AST_NO, AI.BARCODE_TYPE, AI.AST_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(AI.PURC_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') AS PURC_DATE, CONCAT(FORMAT(AI.PURC_PRICE, 0), ' 원') AS PURC_PRICE, AI.MODEL_SIZE, AI.MODEL_NAME, AI.PURC_COMPANY_ID, IFNULL((SELECT CRM_NM FROM CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO WHERE AI.PURC_COMPANY_ID = CRM_SN), '-') AS PURC_COMPANY_NAME, AI.MF_COMPANY, AI.UNIT, AI.QTY, AI.ORG_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = '0' THEN CONCAT('[법인운영]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'R' THEN CONCAT('[R&D]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'S' THEN CONCAT('[비R&D]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'D' THEN CONCAT('[엔지니어링]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'V' THEN CONCAT('[용역/기타]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = '3' THEN CONCAT('[기타]', AI.PJT_NM) END FUNDING_SOURCE_TXT, AP.AST_PLACE_NAME, AI.DEPT_SEQ, AI.EMP_SEQ, AI.EMP_NAME, AI.PURPOSE, AI.REMARK, IC.INSIDE_DT_CODE_NM, AI.AST_FILE_NO, AI.RELATED_FILE_NO FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO AI LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_POSITION ACP ON AI.AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID = ACP.AST_CP_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_CLASS ACC ON AI.AST_TYPE_CODE = ACC.AST_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC1 ON AI.AST_CODE_ID_1 = AC1.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC2 ON AC2.AST_UPPER_CODE = AC1.AST_CODE_ID AND AI.AST_CODE_ID_2 = AC2.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC3 ON AC3.AST_UPPER_CODE = AC2.AST_CODE_ID AND AI.AST_CODE_ID_3 = AC3.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE AP ON AI.AST_PLACE_SN = AP.AST_PLACE_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INSIDE_CODE IC ON AI.AST_STS_CODE = IC.INSIDE_DT_CODE AND IC.INSIDE_MD_CODE = '03' WHERE AI.AST_INFO_SN = #{astInfoSn}

SELECT AI.AST_INFO_SN, CONCAT(ACP.AST_CP_CODE_NM, ' > ', ACC.AST_TYPE_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC1.AST_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC2.AST_CODE_NM, ' > ', AC3.AST_CODE_NM) AS AST_GUBUN, AI.AST_NO, AI.BARCODE_TYPE, AI.AST_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(AI.PURC_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') AS PURC_DATE, CONCAT(FORMAT(AI.PURC_PRICE, 0), ' 원') AS PURC_PRICE, AI.MODEL_SIZE, AI.MODEL_NAME, AI.PURC_COMPANY_ID, IFNULL((SELECT CRM_NM FROM CAM_CRM.DJ_CRM_INFO WHERE AI.PURC_COMPANY_ID = CRM_SN), '-') AS PURC_COMPANY_NAME, AI.MF_COMPANY, AI.UNIT, AI.QTY, AI.ORG_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = '0' THEN CONCAT('[법인운영]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'R' THEN CONCAT('[R&D]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'S' THEN CONCAT('[비R&D]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'D' THEN CONCAT('[엔지니어링]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = 'V' THEN CONCAT('[용역/기타]', AI.PJT_NM) WHEN AI.FUNDING_SOURCE = '3' THEN CONCAT('[기타]', AI.PJT_NM) END FUNDING_SOURCE_TXT, AP.AST_PLACE_NAME, AI.DEPT_SEQ, AI.EMP_SEQ, AI.EMP_NAME, AI.PURPOSE, AI.REMARK, IC.INSIDE_DT_CODE_NM, AI.AST_FILE_NO, AI.RELATED_FILE_NO FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_INFO AI LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_POSITION ACP ON AI.AST_CODE_COMPANY_ID = ACP.AST_CP_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE_CLASS ACC ON AI.AST_TYPE_CODE = ACC.AST_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC1 ON AI.AST_CODE_ID_1 = AC1.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC2 ON AC2.AST_UPPER_CODE = AC1.AST_CODE_ID AND AI.AST_CODE_ID_2 = AC2.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_CODE AC3 ON AC3.AST_UPPER_CODE = AC2.AST_CODE_ID AND AI.AST_CODE_ID_3 = AC3.AST_CODE LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ASSET_PLACE AP ON AI.AST_PLACE_SN = AP.AST_PLACE_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_INSIDE_CODE IC ON AI.AST_STS_CODE = IC.INSIDE_DT_CODE AND IC.INSIDE_MD_CODE = '03' WHERE AI.AST_INFO_SN = #{astInfoSn}
